恩人.definition: a benefactor; a person who has significantly helped sb else

恩仇.definition: debt of gratitude coupled with duty to avenge

恩准.definition: approved by His (or Her) Majesty; permission graciously granted (from highly authoritative position); to graciously permit; to condescend to allow

恩同再造.definition: your favor amounts to being given a new lease on life (idiom)

恩培多克勒.definition: Empedocles (490-430 BC), Greek Sicilian pre-Socratic philosopher

恩威兼施.definition: to employ both kindness and severity (idiom)

恩寵.definition: special favor from a ruler; Emperor's generosity towards a favorite

恩將仇報.definition: to bite the hand that feeds one (idiom)

恩平市.definition: Enping, county-level city in Jiangmen 江門市|江门市[Jiang1men2 Shi4], Guangdong

恩怨.definition: gratitude and grudges; resentment; grudges; grievances

恩愛.definition: loving affection (in a couple); conjugal love

恩斷義絕.definition: to split up; to break all ties

恩施.definition: see 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1shi1 Tu3jia1zu2 Miao2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1]; see 恩施市[En1shi1 Shi4]

恩施土家族苗族自治州.pinyin: En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1
恩施土家族苗族自治州.definition: Enshi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, in Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2bei3 Sheng3]

恩施州.definition: see 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1shi1 Tu3jia1zu2 Miao2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1]

恩施市.definition: Enshi prefecture-level city in Hubei, capital of Enshi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1]

恩格斯.definition: Friedrich Engels (1820-1895), socialist philosopher and one of the founder of Marxism

恩比天大.definition: to be as kind and benevolent as heaven (idiom)

恩澤.definition: favor from an emperor or high official

恩里科·費米.definition: Enrico Fermi (1901-1954), Italian born US nuclear physicist
